name: COLOURLESS (itch) (NumMachine)
description:
-----------------

MADE IN 48 HOURS FOR THE SGDA GAME JAM

JUMP, DOUBLE JUMP, WALL JUMP AND DASH YOUR WAY THROUGH THIS GAME!

CONTROLS

--------------------------

MOVEMENT-A/D OR ARROW KEYS

JUMP AND DOUBLE JUMP -J OR UP ARROW

VERTICAL DASH-S OR DOWN ARROW
